phrases: Stop!
Stop!
Wait for the traffic light!
Something interesting's bound to happen this year...
Who will end up crying, and who will be left laughing?
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Doushite umaku ikanai wa
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kono unmei bakari I love
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Atsui omoi wo uketomete
Doko made mo tsunagattetai
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
I love this destiny
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
Episode 16 ...
We will not be able to make it any smaller than this.
Does not matter.
It is going into the bonfire anyway.
Are we really going to light it all on fire?
I will take back what I said before.
What I said on the day of the summer festival.
I do not say things like no matter what happens, we will always be friends.
After all, there is no one who could replace you.
That is why I am going to try my hardest to keep our friendship intact.
I guess I must like you or something.
This must be the real confession time, huh?
Just kidding.
I am glad you are my friend.
You better make sure you do not forget those words.
W-What the hell?!
What are you guys doing here?!
Hold him down!
Hurry and tie him up!
Do not hate us for this!
Do not hate you for this?
Moto!
Help me!
I told you that I would try my hardest to keep our friendship intact, did not I?
If everything goes well between me and Takahashi, everything will be fine!
That is why I am not going to let you confess to her.
This is the best way to do that, right?
T-That is dirty!
You are too naive.
Sorry!
Once I am all finished, I will let you go.
Love you, Take-chan!
See ya!
H-Hey!
Ah, carry him over to the science room.
Moto!
I did not want this kind of confession!
They just turned on the music.
Here comes the time for confessions this year!
Ah, look over there!
He is confessing to her!
No way!
I do!
Are we getting married out here?
You are crazy.
Takahashi.
I will only say this once, so listen carefully.
I love you.
Every time I remember, my heart beats so fast... as if it happened only yesterday.
Umm, excuse me...
Do you have a minute?
I am sorry.
Save it for later.
Later...?
Mizuguchi.
Hello?
Nana.
Where are you right now?
Huh?
I am helping out at the announcement booth.
Something happen?
How can you ask something like that right now?
He is here...
The announcement booth?
Tell her I will be right there, so stay put!
Yano just left, headed your way.
And one more thing...
If my intuition's correct, Takeuchi-kun's coming, too.
Think hard about it and give them an answer, okay?
No way...
Both of them are coming...
What will I do...?
Is Takahashi here?!
Huh?
She was just here a minute ago...
Did she go somewhere?
Huh?
She ran away, did not she?
What will I do?
I am still not sure about my feelings...
Damn it!
They locked me in!
Out of my way!
It is no good...
I am too much of a coward...
I am too gutless to actually break the glass...
I am sure he could shatter it without a second thought!
You are too naive.
I have my own way of doing things.
I can drop down onto the roof of that storage she would.
If I screw up...
I will come back as a ghost and haunt you!
Takahashi!
Takahashi!
I am sorry, Yano...
I am... too much of a coward...
Where are you?
Pick up!
Takahashi...
Takahashi!
I cannot pick up the phone right now.
Damn it!
Takahashi-
I will not let you go to her!
Hey!
Let go of me!
As if!
When did you even...?!
Too bad for you, huh?
God damn it!
I will not forgive you for this!
That is my line!
I will get to her first!
I will die before I let you!
You want to fight?!
Damn straight!
Enough!
Fighting over her is useless.
She does not want to talk to anyone right now.
Let her be.
She... wanted me to pass that along.
It just means she does not want to hear us right now.
That is it, right?
That is pretty much her answer, is not it?
What the hell is up with that...?
If she does not want to hear us out, she should tell us to our faces.
If she wants to refuse us, she should say so herself!
Please try to understand Nana's feelings.
I cannot.
Well...
I can sort of understand how Yano feels, too...
Hey.
Do you know how to forget about an old love?
You find a new love.
If that new love is true, then the old love will naturally become part of the past.
What is... true love?
Takahashi.
You are in there, are not you?
Please say something.
You are not being fair, running away like this.
Why are you hiding?
It is not like you.
Come on out.
But I cannot come up with an answer!
I do not know what is best... what is most right...
Will I be able to get through this without crying?
No matter how much I think about it, I just do not know...
I do not want to be hurt anymore...
I do not want to hurt anyone, either.
Hey, Takahashi...
I do not think anyone wants to hurt anyone else...
But I think the person... or people...
And of course, no one wants to make you suffer.
But... in the end, if it has to be that way...
You should stay hidden like this tonight, Takahashi.
But... can I say one thing?
Takahashi... no one knows what is the best, or what the future holds.
Until you actually see the results, no one ever knows.
So at the very least, why do not we rely on what we do know?
Let us keep the feelings we have right now precious.
The feelings I have right now...
Can I really...
You found...
It is that easy.
Goodbye.
And of course, no one wants to make you suffer.
Takeuchi-kun!
Is that all you came for?
Did not you have something you wanted to say to me?
Like... did not you have another reason to come?
Yeah.
What was it?
Moto and I...
I thought I would say that... but anyway, hurry and go see him.
He is being really sulky.
You are both... so nice...
I need to answer you...
Yano, where are you?
I will give you as much love as you want!
I am watching you, so...!
I am always watching you, so...!
I am always watching over you, so...!
Nanami, you big liar...
I do not want to hurt him...
And then I chase after him again...
Why do we keep falling in love with each other?
Why did you come?
Because I thought you would be crying.
I am not crying, damn it...
I am not...
You have always annoyed me from the start...
You say your own selfish things, and you stir up all my feelings...
You are so clingy...
You are cruel.
Yet despite all that...
You annoy me.
I wish I could rewrite my past.
But I cannot.
That is impossible.
What kind of present will make your past pale in comparison?
Something like this...
A reality where I exist and you are there next to me.
Will I be able to become stronger...?
I have a condition.
Tell me all about Nana-san.
I do not know much about her.
I have not pressed the issue so far because I have been thinking of you.
I want to hear about your feelings for her, and once I sort out my feelings about them...
It might be difficult for you, but...
I think it is necessary for this to work.
I want you tell me about Nana-san with your own words from your own mouth.
If you cannot do that, I cannot come back.
Can you?
I did not see the meaning in doing something like that...
Will you just run away from it?
I guess you would.
There is no way you could confront it now.
After all, you have been running from it for two whole years now.
Who said I could not do it?
So you do feel like talking about it.
If you can do it, and do it well, I will give you this as a present.
You...!
Did not you tell me you erased it?!
I asked you over and over, but you kept telling me you did not have it, did not you?!
I was obviously lying.
Looks like you are a little naive yourself.
Do not worry.
I will not try to pull you down.
I just want to say that now that Takahashi's serious, you would better get serious, too.
If you only take a half-assed attitude towards this, you have no right to make up with her.
That is so lame!
Shut up.
So in the end, you did not confess to her at all?
There is no way I could...
Why are you going about this in such a roundabout way?
As long I am going out with Yano, we will eventually run into this problem again...
I wonder if he will be able to talk about it...
He told me he would.
I am kind of interested to know how he feels in his heart.
Umm... Takeuchi-kun, would you listen with me to the story about Nana-san?
Huh?
Me?
Honestly, I am really uneasy about it...
I am also a really nice person, I guess.
Huh?
Or maybe...

Everyone is in the way.
I waved my hand, but your back is
already swerving through the crowd of people and sinking into the evening sun.
I closed my eyes and began to remember
the words you told me.
Only happy memories
are supposed to be there, but I become anxious.
Why does my heart waver so?
I want to tell you about my overflowing feelings...
I love you, I love you, I love you more than anything.
Wherever I am, whatever time it may be
you are always there for me.
And I will accept that because
these memories will not fade.
One day, under the deep sea, the time we had
will become blue sand.
And I wonder if it will be put to sleep
like these undying feelings I have right now...
I am quivering alone
in this bed without you.
But when I rolled over, I could not see the blue sky.
You always loved
looking out at the town
from this room, did not you?
The passing seasons
were gentle to us.
Things got awkward, and we became unable to speak to each other,
and you returned to the sea.
But I feel that you are still
living the closest to me, with me.
When I accept the loneliness
I try to leave it to someone else
because it is a little easier that way.
Come dawn,
I am in this bed without you
quivering alone.
But when I close my eyes, I can see the blue sky.
Look, another star shot by in the summer's night sky.
We lovers could feel it in our hearts and upon our bodies.
With just the warmth of your hand holding mine,
I feel like I could go anywhere, fly anywhere.
Instead of counting the infinite stars,
I would rather stay like this with you,
forever connected to you.
Even if I get hurt, or hurt you,
I do not know what I would do.
But I love you.
Look, you are smiling, and your heart must be beating faster.
We are clumsy, and we cannot say things very easily.
I would like to keep the feelings we have now precious
and not wait for them to arrive tomorrow, or have missed them yesterday.
Instead of painting my dreams,
I would rather stay like this with you,
forever embraced.
I want to protect you
so you will strongly leap into my arms.
I do not know what I will do
but I love you.
A silent rain falls.
A slightly chilly rain.
But it continues to fall, without actually hitting me
as if it is trying to freeze my heart instead.
I have always found your gentle back
on any day, but where do my
winding feelings point?
I wonder what you see
before you?
We keep on running
and we seem like we are going to reach, but do not.
At that distance away from you.
Rain will fall again someday.
A slightly lonely rain
will pour all around and spread
as if it is meant to soothe my heart.
I am always looking at your cute back
but these winding feelings
point me in the other direction.
What am I waiting for
at the end of my search?
We keep on running
and we seem like we are going to reach, but do not.
At that distance away from you.
We keep on running
and we seem like we are going to reach, but do not.
At that distance away from you.
At that distance away from you.
At that distance away from you.
Episode 17 Preview...
I met her in my second year of middle school...
That is all.
Takahashi... are you sure it is not Moto...
Oh, just forget it...
There is no helping it today.
It will just be a normal date.
I have never done anything with my dad before.
My chest hurts...
